title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.299 - Retirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.299 - Retirement

State Regulations

The removal of a fixed asset from service, following its
sale or the end of its productive life, accompanied by the necessary adjustment
of fixed asset and depreciation-reserve accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.299

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
